name: Try to proceed without selecting a payment gateway
scenarioId: get_payment_gateways:Try to proceed without selecting a payment gateway
methodName: Try to proceed without selecting a payment gateway

testSteps.description: Given that the user is on the payment page
When the user does not select any payment gateway and tries to proceed
Then the system should display a message requesting the selection of a payment gateway

userStory.narrative:
As a user, I want to be able to select my preferred payment gateway when making my purchase,
  to ensure that I use my preferred payment method.

title: Try to proceed without selecting a payment gateway
